title: 2011 Nathan White Brush Fire
name: 2011 Nathan White Brush Fire
description: Location of various services for brush fire I assisted on in 2011.

properties.name: Station 22-6 (Brush Truck)
properties.description: The closest response vehicle to the fire ... the Brush Truck from Wadestown VFD.

properties.name: Station Marion-6/3
properties.description: What Brian (6-03, one of the fire dept. captains) and JR (6-09) arrived in. Even with 6x6 on, they couldn't get the brush fire engine any closer.

properties.name: Station Marion/65, or Fairview Enigne 5.
properties.description: This is where I arrived to the fire scene at. I'll just say this ... we have no good "road" in there, and what is marked as "roads" here are really abandoned ATV trails from years ago.

properties.name: Nearest Watersource
properties.description: This is where the Upper Stewarts Run travels down Happy Hollar, otherwise known as where we got the water to fight the fire.

properties.name: Brushfire
properties.description: This is approximately what was actually either burning or burned prior to our getting toned for the assist. Decent size area to fight a fire for some small-town fire companies.

properties.name: Watersource
properties.description: Since it is several miles to the nearest fire hydrant, we used tankers and filled up on water from Stewarts Run (a small stream/tributary) to get water to fight the brushfire.

properties.name: Brushfire
properties.description: The approximate area affexted by the brushfire we fought in 2011.
